net.acperience.cloudplayer

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.acperience.cloudplayer.FileManager

  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    File manager class to take care of uploading to the current user's bucket Each instance of the class is tied to a Servlet
    Author:
    Lawliet
